int: "League of Legends" 2024 PCS Summer Finals Ticket Sales Information Contest Information Date August 31, 2024 (Sat), 2024, 1024 (Sunday) Activities of 1500 Open, 1600 program starting venue Taipei Peace Basketball Hall venue Address to the sale time at No. 28 Lane 76, Dunnan Street, Da'an District, Taipei City, August 15th at 12 noon to buy tickets at 12 noon. Following the fruits in the most mixed melody and the handsomeness of the countryside. banana".The creation base sets out a sincere and smooth rock song for his hometown of Kaohsiung Qishan from the rural emotions to his hometown.Taiqing Banana is the original intention of the orchestra that combines rural industries and music in Taiwan to convey the care of land, the observation of the industrial rise and decline in the song and live performance of the banana industry of the Qishan of the hometown, and the enthusiastic combination of practical musicians and musicians and musicians and musicians and the practice of practical enthusiasm. The role of farmers has developed a very characteristic orchestra to attract more people to pay attention to the voices of local youths.After the 2008 Ballad Corps, the series of local industrial cultural operations have been profound in the field survey, local small travel, local industrial promotion, and community construction.The four -year background blue banana band has become the energy of farmers to play the influence of the influence of the influence of the influence of music and actual actions. Therefore, the energy of surviving and brightening the old signboards began to gather social actions.In 2009, the first EP "Banana He is not fat" said that the problem of the banana industry in Taiwan has also successfully attracted the society to start paying attention to the banana industry.In 2013, the first music album "Community Large and Small" was transformed from the public affairs of the community to music to music. It was the first music work in Taiwan with the theme of community creation.In 2018, "Planting Youth" as an important mileage work in the 10th year of becoming the army told the warm land, which brought a simple and sincere movement to the chaotic society.Tour Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, Singapore, and Malaysia.2020 released the single "You are a driver, my guest".The reason for creating in 2022 is not that you will be selected as the south and sing original songs.In 2024, the single "Film's fruit is not too sweet" heard the unique flavor of the fruits and people in the eyes of farmers.In the past 15 years, the orchestra has served as banana farmers and continued to accumulate more than 800 performances. No matter the temple fair, the arts and cultural celebrations, the promotion of agricultural production and the promotion of the dynamic agricultural promotion from the land, the music and industry Fully combined into the corner of Taiwan society.Turning reversing the grief of the banana industry in Taiwan and the characteristics of driving the market.This year, the fruits of the creative fate are not too sweet as the tourism orchestra to experience the addition of the new drummer "APLLE" after the last ticket sales tour and the group members have successively completed the marriage and growth of the marriage life. Musician, ChineseCanadian, from Shooc StudioNotable Works Why You Look Sad, Serenade, Nomo, Procrastination, Orange Marmalade, HaloGrowing up between two sides of the world has given Diverseddie a dual perspective on life, granting him a unique path in music creation He seeks to find a shared essence between the atmospheres of both English and Chinese, retaining the authentic feel of the English RB vibe while infusing it with the depth and beauty of the Chinese languageRaised with a strong influence of classical music, Diverseddie began exploring jazz in high school Like many young people with dreams but unsure of the path to take, he chose a traditional route after college, working as an engineer for several yearsIn 2018, Diverseddie embarked on his journey as a professional musician, releasing his first EP, Against All Odds, which chronicles his growth and the challenges he has overcome His subsequent singles have been featured on major playlists on platforms like NetEase Cloud Music and Spotify PONDER and HOMESICK have been on Spotify‚Äôs Chinese HipHop Select list for over 40 weeks, and the hit single Why You Look Sad has garnered over 100 million streamsThis year, he released singles like nevermind, who cares, and so what, showcasing his more mature musical persona In the soft and romantic chords, he hopes that all worries and emotions will be washed away tit: Lin Shurong 2024 Last Night Star World Tour Concert
int: Organizer: Media Stack International Marketing Business Co., Ltd., Lucky Gate Cultural Brokerage Enterprise Society: Furong Hotel "Anna", "Last Night Star", "Unexpicious Ending" and other songs in the 7080s all over the streets Lin Shurong after a small song!Lin Shurong has been active in Xingma and other places in recent years to offer her moving voice to fans, but she has not forgotten her agreement with fans in Taiwan: She must hold a large personal concert in Taiwan!Under the enthusiastic invitations of the organizer, the promise with fans has finally achieved not only singing in Taiwan, but also singing throughout the world!"Lin Shurong 2024 Last Night Star World Tour" was officially launched!IntersectionThis time Lin Shurong invited Lin Junyi, who was shortlisted for the king of the golden song Taiwanese song this year as a guest of the concert. the Orders section of your member account If you cannot find your order, the transaction was not successful, and you need to reorder4 The KKTIX system does not have a fixed ticket release time Unpaid you select selfselection, you can change seats within the specified time If there are no adjacent seats, the system will allocate nonadjacent seats matching the number of tickets selected  Payment verification process  Ticket Pickup FamilyMart handling fee of 30 per transaction, limited to 4 tickets, please pay at the FamilyMart counter  Ticket Pickup Time 925 for the 105 event  KKTIX Ticket times to save your valuable time7 Disabled Ticket Information  Only available for purchase on the KKTIX website Please complete the disability identity verification the day before the event goes on sale Verification cannot be guaranteed on the day of sale Accounts verified on the day of sale cannot be guaranteed to successfully purchase tickets  How to verify disability identity Click here 2 tickets per event The necessary companion discount must pass government identity verification to purchase companion tickets  Disabled priority seats are allocated based on the areas, seats, and tit: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles"

tit: Mono 25th Anniversary Orchestral Tour Oath Asia Tour 2024
int: Mono has continuously challenged the various possibilities of exploratory instrumental rock in the past few decades. This has also made them one of the most important Asian bands to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the band and will start their first 12 -person orchestra. As the Asian tour, with the success of their new album Oath, it is expected that this performance will be a particularly and beautiful performance.About Oath, what do we have done in 2020 what will be the existentialism of the former classic night idlers almost become the topic of everyone's daily discussion. What can we do in a limited life? Mono discusses some themes that are the relationship between light and darkness, the hope of facing disaster, the duality of life and death. In the 12th album, they think about the time for life and how to make full use of that period of time.An old friend and partner of Steve Albini recorded and mixed together to let OATH open with the slow rise of orchestra to make the orchestra into the atmosphere before joining the violin.In the 71 minutes of the entire album, Mono thought about time and life to add a beautiful atmosphere to a beautiful atmosphere to a new height in a new height at a beautiful atmosphere.Mono challenged himself with a publicism related existentialism and provided kind reflection with the album of OATH instead of fleeting.‚ÄúÊàë‰ª¨ÁîüÊ¥ªÂú®‰∏Ä‰∏™‰ªéÂ∞èÂ∞±Ê≤°ÊúâÊîπÂèòÁöÑË™ìË®ÄÂΩì‰∏≠Âê¨È£éÂú®Âî±Ê≠åÊàë‰ª¨ÊòØÂÆáÂÆôÁöÑ‰∏ÄÈÉ®ÂàÜÊàë‰ª¨Â∑≤ÁªèÁü•ÈÅìÊàë‰ª¨ËØ•ÊÄé‰πàÂÅö‰ª•Âèä‰ªÄ‰πàÊòØÁîüÂëΩ‰∏≠ÊúÄÈáçË¶ÅÁöÑTakaakira 'Goto',MONOMONO 25th Anniversary Orchestral TourOATH Asia Tour 2024Featuring 12Piece Orchestralive in Taipeidate20241106venuezepp New TaipeIMEDOOR 1900 Start 2000TicketAdv 200022002400 will use a full seat method (except 2F station areas) to enter the section of the 2F station area in line.

tit: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles"
int: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles" was officially launched in 2024, which has been officially launched in 40 years. After his family arrived in Indonesia, he studied in the United States and Canada after studying in Japan. In 1983, he was introduced to the Emi Taiwan (Emi Taiwan) in October 1984, "Back to Singapore to visit relatives in Singapore. road".Because the growth process of the article traveled to many countries has created his unique style, and the content of the lyrics is full of wandering and foreign travelers who missed the old land. Travel in Taiwan, China, Singapore and Malaysia.A high -pitched voice of 365 miles not only sang a wandering tour, but also the endless suffering in his heart, so he was widely welcomed in the Asian region.In 1985, he won the Best Newcomer Award of the Golden Volual Award and the "Golden Ding Award" Best Singer Award. The amazing record made the article the first classic golden song of the singer in the late 1980s.The famous works include "The Clouds of the Hometown", "Three Sixty -Fifty -five Miles", "Ancient Moon Zhao Shijin", "Wangtian", "Thousands of Love You" and other famous songs. favorite.ÂîÆÁ•®ËµÑËÆØÊºÇÊ≥äÂè∞ÂåóÂú∫Ê¥ªÂä®Êó∂Èó¥Ôºö20241019ÔºàÂÖ≠Ôºâ 1930Ê≠£ÂºèÂºÄÊºîÊ¥ªÂä®Âú∞ÁÇπÔºöÂè∞ÂåóÂõΩÈôÖ‰ºöËÆÆ‰∏≠ÂøÉTICCÔºàÂè∞ÂåóÂ∏Ç‰ø°‰πâÂå∫‰ø°‰πâË∑Ø‰∫îÊÆµ1Âè∑ÔºâÁ•®‰ª∑Ôºö3600„ÄÅ3200„ÄÅ2800„ÄÅ2400„ÄÅ2000„ÄÅ1600„ÄÅ 1200ÊºÇÊ≥äÂè∞‰∏≠Âú∫Ê¥ªÂä®Êó∂Èó¥Ôºö20241109ÔºàÂÖ≠Ôºâ 1930Ê≠£ÂºèÂºÄÊºîÊ¥ªÂä®Âú∞ÁÇπÔºöÂè∞‰∏≠‰∏≠ÂÖ¥Â§ßÂ≠¶ÊÉ†Ëç™Â†ÇÔºàÂè∞‰∏≠Â∏ÇÂçóÂå∫ÂÖ¥Â§ßË∑Ø145Âè∑ÔºâÁ•®‰ª∑Ôºö3600„ÄÅ3200„ÄÅ2800„ÄÅ2400„ÄÅ2000„ÄÅ1600„ÄÅ1200„ÄÅ 800ÊºÇÊ≥äÈ´òÈõÑÂú∫Ê¥ªÂä®Êó∂Èó¥Ôºö20241208ÔºàÊó•Ôºâ 1600Ê≠£ÂºèÂºÄÊºîÊ¥ªÂä®Âú∞ÁÇπÔºöÈ´òÈõÑÊµÅË°åÈü≥‰πê‰∏≠ÂøÉÊµ∑Èü≥È¶ÜÈ´òÈõÑÂ∏ÇÁõêÂüïÂå∫ÁúüÁà±Ë∑Ø1Âè∑Á•®‰ª∑Ôºö3600„ÄÅ3200„ÄÅ2800„ÄÅ2400„ÄÅ2000„ÄÅ1600„ÄÅ1200„ÄÅ 800 Details: Please contact the organizer of the Fanpage Page:

tit: 2025 International Shen Wencheng Day, May 11th, Xiapu Tour Concert
int: Mother's Day limited field to relive the popular songs of the golden age of the golden age, the golden song king of the golden song, Shen Wencheng, sang countless songs that have been singing, in addition to Taiwanese classic songs "Who knows", "Drifting", "Drifting", " "Old Love is also Mian Mian", "Come and Go to Taitung", etc., have covered many classic western songs such as Slow Hand, The Temple of the King, Hotel California's first popular songs to accompany the songs and stories; in recent years, his "Five Five "On the 11th of the month" was once again mentioned by fans to shout out the topic of the topic caused by "International Shen Wencheng Day". Lead everyone to relive the golden age of popular songs through classic songs.Shen Wencheng, who has never held a personal concert, held the "International Shen Wencheng Day Tour Concert" in Taichung, Taipei, and Kaohsiung in 2023. The enthusiastic organizer was held in Taipei.Shen Wencheng moved even more surprisingly at the concert to announce the "International Shen Wencheng Day" series of concerts again on May 10, 2025 at the Taipei International Convention Center in the afternoon of May 11, 2025 to sing Zhenggang in Huiyangtang, Taichung, echoing him to win The classic song of the King of Golden Songs, "May 11th", has become the only one in this IP series concert that is 100 % Match to "May 11th Peter Po".May 11, 2025, just happened to be Mother's Day. Mother's Day respects her mother to enter the venue to listen to Shen Wencheng singing from the afternoon to the end of the evening just to take her mother to eat Mother's Day dinner is the perfect schedule for Mother's Day!2025 International Shen Wencheng Day May 11th Bi Xiapu Concert will be scheduled to start on May 6th to set up the earliest record of the historical concert!Friends who like Shen Wencheng are definitely secret!Don't let me do it too much!International Shen Wen Chengri didn't come to listen to Shen Wencheng's concert, right?IntersectionÊØç‰∫≤ËäÇÈôêÂÆöÂè∞ÂåóÂú∫Ê¥ªÂä®Êó∂Èó¥Ôºö20250510ÔºàÂÖ≠Ôºâ 1430Ê≠£ÂºèÂºÄÊºîÊ¥ªÂä®Âú∞ÁÇπÔºöÂè∞ÂåóÂõΩÈôÖ‰ºöËÆÆ‰∏≠ÂøÉTICCÔºàÂè∞ÂåóÂ∏Ç‰ø°‰πâÂå∫‰ø°‰πâË∑Ø‰∫îÊÆµ1Âè∑ÔºâÁ•®‰ª∑Ôºö3600„ÄÅ3200„ÄÅ2800„ÄÅ2400„ÄÅ2000„ÄÅ1600„ÄÅ 1200ÊØç‰∫≤ËäÇÈôêÂÆöÂè∞‰∏≠Âú∫Ê¥ªÂä®Êó∂Èó¥Ôºö20250511ÔºàÊó•Ôºâ 1430Ê≠£ÂºèÂºÄÊºîÊ¥ªÂä®Âú∞ÁÇπÔºöÂè∞‰∏≠‰∏≠ÂÖ¥Â§ßÂ≠¶ÊÉ†Ëç™Â†ÇÔºàÂè∞‰∏≠Â∏ÇÂçóÂå∫ÂÖ¥Â§ßË∑Ø145Âè∑ÔºâÁ•®‰ª∑Ôºö3600„ÄÅ3200„ÄÅ2800„ÄÅ2400„ÄÅ2000„ÄÅ1600„ÄÅ 1200, 800 Details: Please contact the big international entertainment fan page 2025 International Shen Wencheng May 11th, Xiapu International Shen Wencheng, Shen Wencheng, who knows the old love
